article.title: Longbow to Supply Taiwan with UAV Technology
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Longbow Limited Liability Corporation, Orlando, Florida, was awarded a $64,332,047 firm-fixed-price contract for the modification of an existing contract to definitize radar electronic unit and unmanned aerial vehicle tactical common data link low rate initial production for Taiwan.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
